name: Grater simulator
description:
The Flop sim game challenges you. How many vegetables and fruits can you rub. How much you have enough strength to grate foods for salads and dishes. Crap everything that comes to hand while you have strength. Increase your level, move from beginner to professional. Levels on time. When you become a master, the professional level will give you an infinite amount of vegetables and fruits. Start shaking the phone and the fruit will rub. Shake the phone without stopping.
Bored at home or at work? Are you sitting in a traffic jam? Waiting for friends who are late? Start to rub the vegetables. Grater simulator is an excellent remedy for boredom.
Download now!
Play and enjoy!
Thanks for the good reviews!
